Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2011 12:09AM efiorianti wrote: I was diagnosed in Nov 2008 with very early breast cancer. Last week I found a lump below my breast and today had surgery to remove it. Even though all of the doctors tell me it is benign I just cant stop worrying. Is this normal? I just want to see it in black and white.
